ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He turned on them, striking out with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he started striking them down with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he turned upon them, striking them with his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He struck them with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He then began striking them with his right hand, unseen by the people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he turned upon them, striking (them) with (his) right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he turned against them secretly, smiting them with the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then he attacked them, striking with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then he turned on them, striking them down with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he slipped Unto them striking them with the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he attacked them, striking forcefully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then did he turn upon them, striking (them) with the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he turned upon them, striking (them) with (his) right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And he turned upon them striking them with the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he turned on them, striking with his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:93] He then turned on them striking [them] with his right hand, with might, smashing them. Those who saw him reported this to [the rest of] his people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then he attacked them striking with his right hand) with an axe; it is also said that he fulfilled his oath.
